scripts.build:all: tsc && cd app/backend && npm run bundle && cd ./../..
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd app/backend && npm install
scripts.test: npm run build && npm run test:snapshot && npm run spell && npm run format:check
scripts.cdk-deploy: npm run build:all && dotenv cdk deploy --require-approval never --profile $AWS_PROFILE '*' && npm run update-frontend-web-socket-uri
scripts.cdk-destroy: npm run build:all && dotenv cdk destroy --require-approval never --profile $AWS_PROFILE '*'
scripts.cdk-diff: npm run build:all && dotenv cdk diff --require-approval never --profile $AWS_PROFILE '*'
scripts.cdk-synth: npm run build:all && dotenv cdk synth --require-approval never --profile $AWS_PROFILE '*'
scripts.cdk-bootstrap: npm run build:all && dotenv cdk bootstrap --profile $AWS_PROFILE
scripts.tf-plan: npm run build:all && dotenv -- terraform -chdir=terraform plan
scripts.tf-apply: npm run build:all && dotenv -- terraform -chdir=terraform apply -auto-approve
scripts.tf-destroy: npm run build:all && dotenv -- terraform -chdir=terraform destroy -auto-approve
